TopicTitle: [Video] KSP Interstellar - Power Networks, Power Generation (May 4th, 2014)

Articles.Content:
I've made a video that covers the basics of power stations, relays, transmitters, and networks.

And here's as much of a comprehensive video on reactors, generators and radiators as I could manage. I really just got going and didn't find a good stopping spot. So, I must warn you this video is long. It does go into nearly every reactor type. I forgot the AiM reactor though

If there is interest, I will continue with a series explaining more aspects of KSPI.

Edited May 5, 2014 by WaveFunctionP
Updated with new tutorial video.
This is exactly what I've been looking for! Keep up the good work. (And have some Rep)
That is great! I am waiting your new videos..
Update OP with new video covering reactors, generators, and radiators. Along with some bug workarounds.
These are very useful, please do continue making these!
Do one about warp drive maneuvering into orbit. I know theres a handful of guys out there who are pretty good at it. But some of us could use a little help
